title: HMCL启动器打不开
author: zycdojar
txt_content:
使用的是Oracle JDK1.8_u101(x86_64)打开，之前是可以的使用的是jdk1.8_u11后来被hmcl要求升级java，完成后如此……
jack@TheKing:~$ java -jar /games/hmcl.jar
[20:14:41] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.main/INFO] *** HMCL 3.2.149 ***
[20:14:41] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.main/INFO] Operating System: Linux 5.3.0-18-generic

[20:14:41] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.main/INFO] Current Directory: /home/jack
[20:14:41] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.main/INFO] HMCL Directory: /home/jack/.hmcl
[20:14:41] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.main/INFO] Memory: 981MB
[20:14:41] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.lambda$main$2/INFO] Metaspace: 8MB
Graphics Device initialization failed for :  es2, sw
Error initializing QuantumRenderer: no suitable pipeline found
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Error initializing QuantumRenderer: no suitable pipeline found
        at com.sun.javafx.tk.quantum.QuantumRenderer.getInstance(QuantumRenderer.java:280)

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Error initializing QuantumRenderer: no suitable pipeline found
        at com.sun.javafx.tk.quantum.QuantumRenderer$PipelineRunnable.init(QuantumRenderer.java:94)

[20:14:41] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.CrashReporter.uncaughtException/SEVERE] Uncaught exception in thread main
java.lang.RuntimeException: No toolkit found
        at com.sun.javafx.tk.Toolkit.getToolkit(Toolkit.java:217)

replies.author: ETW_Derp
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ETW_Derp 于 2020-4-12 20:36 编辑 

看报错：
Graphics Device initialization failed for :  es2, sw
在网上搜索一番，可以得到解决方法：
将libswt-GTK-3-java和gkt 3添加到系统中。
来自：https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/ask/49693
另有Github上：
You can run jstock with openjdk, but it needs openjfx to be installed
apt-get install openjfx
should fix this (i just run into the same issue and this seems to fix it)
你可以用Openjdk执行*某个软件*，但是他需要安装openjfx
apt-get install openjfx
可能解决该问题（我就是这样解决问题的。）
https://github.com/yccheok/jstock/issues/83

再不行朝HMCL开发者扔issue敦促解决问题（

在网上搜索一番，可以得到解决方法：

replies.author: physics1024
replies.txt_content:
先sudo apt-get install openjdk- 11-jdk
然后到https://gluonhq.com/products/javafx/下载jfx11
配置环境变量export PATH_TO_FX=地址
source生效
命令java -module-path $PATH_TO_FX -add-modules=javafx.controls, javafx.graphics, javafx.fxml, javafx.media, javafx.web, javafx.base, javafx.swing -jar 你的HMCL地址

先试试，不行再发
